metadata.dc:author: García Hortelano, J
García de Miguel, M J
López-Herce Cid, J
Ramirez Balza, O
Vidal López, M L
metadata.dc:description: Seven cases of visceral leishmaniasis are reported, whose epidemiologic, clinical, laboratory, evolutive and therapeutical features are presented. Latest findings are described with reference to laboratory tests and new recent possibilities of therapy.
metadata.dc:title: Kala-azar. Presentación de siete casos y revisión de la literatura.
[Kala-azar. Presentation of 7 cases and review of the literature].
